notes: This map illustrates satellite-detected damaged structures in San Julian Area, Eastern Samar Province, Philippines. Using an image acquired by the WorldView-2 satellite on 12 December 2014 and compared with WorldView-1 image collected on 12 July 2014, UNOSAT identified a total of 279 affected structures in the area. Specifically, 66 structures were categorized as destroyed, 148 as severely damaged and 65 as moderately damaged. This is a preliminary analysis and has not yet been validated in the field. Please send ground feedback to UNITAR / UNOSAT.
